adHeader: Easy Going, Reasonably Priced Personal Trainer
adDetails: I am an A.C.E. and TRX certified personal trainer looking to add to my clientele. In addition to my certifications, I have a lot of personal experience with fitness. I have rehabbed myself into some of the best shape of my life after herniating a disk in my back 11 years ago. I also have 8 years of martial arts training in which I received a Brownbelt in Choy Lay Fut Kung Fu and currently hold a Blackbelt in San Shou Kickboxing. I am excited to have the opportunity to pass on my knowledge and experience to other people. I offer reasonable rates and discounts for packages. Please feel free to check out my website ( http://www.jamespittsfitness.com/index.html ) for more details and good luck on your fitness journey! Rates: Consultation is free-Casual meeting to get to know each other and see if we're a good fit Assessment is $25-Basically an easy workout to see how you move, check balance, strength, and flexibility Single 1 hour session is $50 Package of 5 1 hour sessions is $237.50($47.50 a session) Package of 10 1 hour sessions is $450($45 a session) I am mobile and have lots of my own equipment. We can train in your home, in the park, in your apartment building's gym, or at your regular gym, if they allow it. I also have access to a semi-private gym for $10 more an hour.
